Index.title: Innolease
Index.description: Innolease provides comprehensive business vehicle leasing solutions and fleet management services tailored to your exact needs, with transparent pricing and digital tools that streamline operations.

hero.title: Flexible Vehicle Leasing for Every Business
hero.description: Innolease provides comprehensive business vehicle leasing solutions and fleet management services tailored to your exact needs, with transparent pricing and digital tools that streamline operations.

leasing.title: Leasing Solutions
leasing.description: Select the right leasing solution for your company's needs.

financial.title: Financial Leasing
financial.description: Finance only the vehicle with no mileage restrictions. Customer handles maintenance and residual value.

flexible.title: Flexible Leasing
flexible.description: Maintenance costs included on one invoice with residual value based on market estimation.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Leasing
maintenance.description: All-inclusive monthly price with predictable vehicle costs and pre-defined services.

mini.title: MiniLeasing
mini.description: Short-term leasing from 1-12 months, including vehicle and insurance for temporary needs.

fleet.title: Fleet Management Tools
fleet.description: Manage your entire vehicle fleet efficiently with our digital tools.

manager.description: View all contracts, vehicles, costs, and users in one unified interface.

reports.title: Emission & Fleet Reports
reports.description: Track environmental impact and detailed fleet analytics.

policy.title: Policy & Procurement
policy.description: Optimize contracts and manage vehicle procurement with ease.

driver.title: Driver Tools
driver.description: Empower employees with calculators, comparisons, and self-service options.

testimonial1.quote: Innolease's flexible leasing options and digital tools have dramatically simplified our fleet management. Their transparent approach means no surprises.
testimonial1.author: Matti Virtanen

testimonial2.quote: The all-inclusive maintenance leasing package gives us complete cost predictability. Their service network is excellent throughout Finland.
testimonial2.author: Liisa Korhonen

testimonial3.quote: Switching to electric vehicles was simple with Innolease's guidance. Their EV comparison tools helped us make informed decisions.
testimonial3.author: Juha Mäkinen

partners.title: Service Network Partners
partners.description: Nationwide coverage for maintenance, tires, and inspections with trusted partners.

environmental.title: Environmental Responsibility
environmental.description: Reduce your carbon footprint with our electric and hybrid vehicle options.

About.title: About Innolease
About.subtitle: Your partner in flexible and efficient vehicle leasing solutions in Finland.
About.description: Learn about Innolease, our connection to Autolle.com Group, our values, team, and commitment to providing top-tier vehicle leasing services.

history.title: Our Story & Connection to Autolle.com
history.paragraph1: Innolease Oy is a Finnish growth company specializing in vehicle leasing services. As part of the respected Autolle.com Group, we leverage extensive automotive industry expertise to offer innovative and customer-centric leasing solutions.
history.paragraph2: Our foundation is built on Autolle.com's strong market presence and commitment to quality, allowing us to provide reliable and flexible leasing options tailored to the needs of businesses across Finland.

intro.title: Customer-Focused Leasing Services
intro.paragraph1: Innolease is part of the Autolle concern. We have combined our corporate sales unit with our rental service, allowing us to genuinely offer customers various services from long-term leasing to short-term rentals.
intro.paragraph2: Innolease Oy's primary goal is to adapt to customer needs and provide the right solutions for those needs.
intro.paragraph3: We have our own rental fleet of approximately 800 vehicles throughout Finland.
intro.paragraph4: Our dedicated contact person and digital services provide customers with expert and flexible service in automotive matters.
intro.paragraph5: Our goal is to save the customer time and money, reduce risks, and facilitate the management of the customer's vehicle fleet.

fact1.title: Digital Car Sales Leader
fact1.description: Autolle.com digitalizes car sales across Europe, with a network covering all of Finland.

fact2.title: Founded in 2014
fact2.description: Bringing innovation to the automotive market for nearly a decade.

fact3.title: Comprehensive Services
fact3.description: Offering online sales, financing, inspection, home delivery, leasing, and warranty services.

fact4.title: Part of Autollecom Group
fact4.description: Collaborating with Green Motion, Autoeurooppa, Rahoituskumppani, and Rahoituskauppa.

value1.title: Customer Focus
value1.description: We prioritize understanding and meeting our clients' unique needs with tailored solutions.

value2.title: Flexibility
value2.description: We offer adaptable leasing options that evolve with your business requirements.

value3.title: Reliability
value3.description: Backed by Autolle.com Group, we ensure dependable service and high-quality vehicles.

coverage.title: Nationwide Service Coverage
coverage.description: With strategically located partners and a strong network, Innolease provides comprehensive service coverage across Finland, ensuring support wherever your fleet operates.
coverage.mapPlaceholder: Map of Finland showing service coverage
coverage.mapAlt: Map of Innolease service coverage in Finland

meta.title: Leasing Solutions | Innolease
meta.description: Explore our comprehensive vehicle leasing solutions for businesses including Financial, Flexible, Maintenance, and MiniLeasing options.

hero.title: Leasing Solutions for Every Business Need
hero.description: Find the perfect financing structure for your company's vehicle fleet, from simple financial leasing to all-inclusive service packages.

financialLeasing.title: Financial Leasing
financialLeasing.subtitle: Maximum flexibility with minimal commitment
financialLeasing.description: Our Financial Leasing solution provides straightforward vehicle financing without mileage restrictions. You handle maintenance and residual value, giving you complete control over vehicle operation.

features.title: Key Features
features.feature2: Vehicle appears on company balance sheet
features.feature5: Option to purchase at end of term

idealFor.title: Ideal For
idealFor.type4: Organizations that want full control over vehicles

calculator.title: Calculate Your Monthly Payment
calculator.disclaimer: This calculation is for estimation purposes only. Contact us for a detailed quote.

flexibleLeasing.title: Flexible Leasing
flexibleLeasing.subtitle: Balanced control with service benefits
flexibleLeasing.description: Our Flexible Leasing solution combines financial leasing with comprehensive maintenance services on a single monthly invoice. Enjoy predictable maintenance costs while retaining flexibility on vehicle usage.

features.title: Key Features
features.feature1: Maintenance costs included on single invoice

idealFor.title: Ideal For
idealFor.type4: Organizations transitioning from ownership to leasing

caseStudy.title: Case Study: Tech Solutions Oy
caseStudy.challenge: Tech Solutions Oy needed a flexible fleet solution that would provide maintenance coverage while allowing for varying mileage between vehicles.
caseStudy.solution: Innolease provided a Flexible Leasing package with quarterly mileage adjustments and comprehensive maintenance coverage.
caseStudy.result: Fleet costs reduced by 18% with improved vehicle availability and eliminated maintenance administration.
caseStudy.quote: The flexibility to adjust our contracts as business needs change has been invaluable for our growing company.

maintenanceLeasing.title: Maintenance Leasing
maintenanceLeasing.subtitle: All-inclusive worry-free solution
maintenanceLeasing.description: Our Maintenance Leasing provides complete peace of mind with a fixed monthly payment covering everything from financing to comprehensive maintenance, tires, and services. The ultimate hassle-free fleet solution.

idealFor.title: Ideal For
idealFor.type4: Companies prioritizing hassle-free operations over flexibility

miniLeasing.title: MiniLeasing
miniLeasing.subtitle: Short-term flexibility, immediate availability
miniLeasing.description: Our MiniLeasing solution provides short-term vehicle leasing from 1-12 months, including vehicle, maintenance, and insurance in one package. Perfect for temporary needs without long-term commitment.

features.title: Key Features
features.feature5: Wide range of immediately available vehicles

idealFor.title: Ideal For
idealFor.type4: Testing vehicle types before long-term commitment

pricing.title: Pricing Structure
pricing.note: Prices include maintenance, insurance, and 2,000 km/month. Additional mileage available.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What's the minimum lease term available?
faq.a1: Our MiniLeasing starts from just 1 month, while our standard leasing solutions typically begin at 12 months.
faq.q2: Can I switch between leasing types during a contract?
faq.a2: Yes, we offer flexibility to adjust your leasing solution as your business needs change, subject to contract terms.
faq.q3: Are electric vehicles available in all leasing types?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer electric, hybrid, and conventional vehicles across all our leasing solutions.
faq.q4: How extensive is your service network?
faq.a4: We partner with over 800 service locations throughout Finland, including Vianor, Euromaster, and A-Katsastus centers.
faq.q5: Can I include insurance in my leasing package?
faq.a5: Insurance is included by default in MiniLeasing and can be added as an option to our other leasing solutions.
faq.q6: What happens at the end of the lease term?
faq.a6: You can choose to return the vehicle, extend the lease, or in some cases, purchase the vehicle at its residual value.
faq.q7: Can I include multiple vehicle types in one contract?
faq.a7: Yes, we offer fleet solutions that can accommodate various vehicle types under a master agreement with individual schedules.

cta.title: Ready to find your ideal leasing solution?
cta.description: Contact our leasing specialists for a personalized consultation and quote.

meta.title: Innolease | Business Vehicle Leasing & Fleet Management
meta.description: Comprehensive business vehicle leasing solutions and fleet management services with transparent pricing and digital tools.

hero.title: Innolease – Your Partner in Leasing Solutions
hero.description1: Innolease's mission is to adapt to customer needs and offer various options based on which the customer can more easily make a solution suitable for their business.
hero.description2: Our open communication about us. Our mobile vehicle fleet offers an interesting vehicle selection with fast delivery. Our goal is to achieve a wide variation regardless of quantity, from zero vegetation to even ten for the customer's budgeting.

leftCard.title: The Most Suitable Leasing Option and Financing Model for You
leftCard.description: We always have a leasing option and financing model suitable for the customer's situation.

rightCard.title: Flexible and Easy Leasing Service
rightCard.description: As an agile operator, our service is flexible. Special requests regarding scheduling and vehicle equipment are everyday matters for us.

innoFleet.title: InnoFleet Manager
innoFleet.description1: Create all the reports your company needs directly from the web service. Up-to-date information about your entire vehicle fleet gives you the opportunity to manage vehicle-related matters efficiently and save time.
innoFleet.description2: Maintaining your entire vehicle fleet and service functionality is also easily available on your mobile device.

team.title: Company Car and Finance Experts at Your Service

transparency.title: Leasing Solution Costs Transparently
transparency.description: We want to make leasing cars as clear and simple as possible. That's why Innolease's pricing is transparent. You will always receive a truthful and clear offer from us that does not include hidden costs. We do things without unnecessary bureaucracy and get things done.
